title: News Release on Election to RAND Board of Trustees
descriptions: Subsequent to publication of our September 29, 2023 news release and prior to joining the RAND Board of Trustees, Nadia Schadlow withdrew her appointment because of a potential conflict with another professional obligation.

spotlight.Article: Subsequent to publication of our September 29, 2023 news release and prior to joining the RAND Board of Trustees, Nadia Schadlow withdrew her appointment because of a potential conflict with another professional obligation.
